alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Owsley; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Owsley, northwestern Perry, southwestern Breathitt and southeastern Lee Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lerose, or over Booneville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cowcreek, Athol, Ricetown and Gobbard around 255 PM EDT. Jetts Creek around 300 PM EDT. Copebranch, Arnett, Oakdale and Lucky Fork around 305 PM EDT. Houston, Turkey, Guerrant, Morris Fork, Chenowee and Yeadon around 310 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Buckhorn, Canoe, Sebastian`s Branch, Talbert, Crockettsville, Saldee, Howard Creek, Copland, Curt and Whick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
